How many people are affected by chylomicron retention disease ?,Chylomicron retention disease is a rare condition with approximately 40 cases described worldwide.,GHR,chylomicron retention disease
What are the genetic changes related to chylomicron retention disease ?,"Mutations in the SAR1B gene cause chylomicron retention disease. The SAR1B gene provides instructions for making a protein that is involved in transporting chylomicrons within ente
